title: Topic 004 Question 051
body: You plan to use a NuGet package in a project in Azure DevOps. The NuGet package is in a feed that requires authentication.
You need to ensure that the project can restore the NuGet package automatically.
What should the project use to automate the authentication?
options: an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) account that has multi-factor authentication (MFA) enabled
an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) service principal
